Description: Fragment of small Attic black-glazed pottery salt-cellar; flat foot and slightly incurving wall. Glazed save underside. Incised inscription.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 549)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1827)
